commandToExecute:
bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; \
    sudo apt-get update -y; \
    sudo apt-get install -y git unzip ca-certificates >/dev/null; \
    sudo update-ca-certificates || true; \
    echo "[GIT] Clone https://github.com/huynhngocsonuit2000github/az-packages.git @ az-vmss-dotnet-v3"; \
    sudo rm -rf /opt/az-packages; \
    sudo git clone --depth 1 --branch az-vmss-dotnet-v3 --single-branch https://github.com/huynhngocsonuit2000github/az-packages.git /opt/az-packages; \
    PUBZIP=$(find /opt/az-packages -maxdepth 3 -type f -name publish.zip | head -n1); \
    test -n "$PUBZIP" || { echo "publish.zip not found" >&2; exit 1; }; \
    echo "[APP] Replace /app/mysimpleapi"; \
    sudo mkdir -p /app/mysimpleapi; \
    sudo rm -rf /app/mysimpleapi/*; \
    sudo unzip -o "$PUBZIP" -d /app/mysimpleapi >/dev/null; \
    echo "[SYSTEMD] Restart mysimpleapi"; \
    sudo systemctl daemon-reload; \
    sudo systemctl restart mysimpleapi; \
    echo "branch: az-vmss-dotnet-v3" | sudo tee /app/mysimpleapi/RELEASE >/dev/null; \
    echo "[DONE] Deployed az-vmss-dotnet-v3"'
